div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1293 Manissa (anc. Magnesia ad Sipylum) Lydia, 1971 Burial: c. 280 B.C. Contents: 24 AR Alexander III: 20 lifetime and early post. tetradr. (Amphipolis 5, Pella? 1, Mile- tus 1, Citium 1, Salamis 2, Byblus 2, Ace 1, Damascus 1, Babylon 5, Alex- andreia 1) Philip III: 1 tetradr. (Babylon) Lysimachus: 2 tetradr. (Lampsacus 1, Sardes 1) Seleucus I: 1 tetradr. (Seleuceia ad Tigrim) Disposition: dispersed Pfeiler, SM 1971, pp. 61-7, illus.
